entries.assist_16: Time to move, everyone. Into formations, if you please.
entries.assist_15: Ordered rows, if you please. Remember your training.
entries.assist_14: I suggest yuo get into formation, now.
entries.assist_13: Keep a steady hand. Do not forget to concentrate your fire!
entries.assist_12: Hold firm! We must keep them pinned down.
entries.assist_11: Steady hands now. Coordinate your fire, please.
entries.assist_10: Very well, everyone. Kindly place yourselves in formation.
entries.assist_9: I suggest we surround this target and eliminate them.
entries.assist_8: I'm confident we can pin them down.
entries.assist_7: I do believe they will regret taking on a crack unit like this one.
entries.assist_6: If everyone could form up now, please.
entries.assist_5: If you could get yourselves into formation now, please...?
entries.assist_3: Do not forget to concentrate your fire!
entries.assist_2: I do believe we should surround them.
entries.assist_1: Very well, let us pin them down.
entries.hit_target_16: Surrender now, and I might permit you to live.
entries.hit_target_15: Oh dear, did I hurt you? Unavoidable given the circumstances, I fear.
entries.hit_target_14: You had best beat a retreat while you still can.
entries.hit_target_12: It's regrettable how... coarse violence is. Do you agree?
entries.hit_target_11: Now, now, no sense trying to escape.
entries.hit_target_10: I fear your fate is inevitable, my friend.
entries.hit_target_8: Only a cowardly poltroon would fail to stand toe to toe with an honorable foe such as I!
entries.hit_target_7: Goodness, that does appear to have hurt. My apologies.
entries.hit_target_6: I shall endeavor to make this quick. If you'd just stand still...
entries.hit_target_5: Aha! I do believe I got you!
entries.hit_target_3: That, I believe, was a palpable hit.
entries.hit_target_1: I am impressed by your capacity to absorb punishment.
entries.ally_16: Allow me to intercede... merely to even the odds somewhat.
entries.ally_15: My friend, allow me to take care of this miscreant.
entries.ally_14: Well, now. Really, it's just not done.
entries.ally_13: Really, I do believe that a maggot such as yourself ought not to touch my friends.
entries.ally_10: I see that I must stoop to violence now...
entries.ally_9: It appears that you could use my assistance.
entries.ally_8: Are you in need of any assistance, my friend?
entries.ally_7: I do believe you should select a more fitting opponent. Such as myself.
entries.ally_6: If you dare to engage in violence, surely you dare to challenge me instead?
entries.ally_5: Now, just a moment there! What the blazes are you doing?
entries.ally_3: I advise you to withdraw immediately.
entries.ally_2: You shall not lay a finger on my friends!
entries.ally_1: Move away from my worthy friend here, or suffer the consequences.
entries.help_16: Quickly, I am in need of succour!
entries.help_14: I am in need of help! Hurry!
entries.help_13: A rapid response to my cries of help would be most appreciated.
entries.help_11: I do believe I might require assistance here.
entries.help_10: Might someone be able to assist me here?
entries.help_9: To blazes with dignity. HELLLP! HEEEELLLLP!
entries.help_8: To me, my friends! To me!
entries.help_7: I am forced to admit that I may not be able to hadle this situation alone.
entries.help_6: It pains me to admit it, but I may need help.
entries.help_5: If it's not too much trouble... HELP!
entries.help_2: I would not object to some help over here.
entries.help_1: Remember me in my time of peril! Help!
entries.attacked_16: I do hope that all the arrangements have been made for a tidy funeral?
entries.attacked_14: Really, blood is SO messy. Must I kill you?
entries.attacked_13: Ah, I may appear helpless, but I have unsuspected depths.
entries.attacked_12: I imagine that if you began to flee now, I might feel disinclined to catch you.
entries.attacked_11: It is a good day to die, I suppose.
entries.attacked_10: Must we fight? It's so... common.
entries.attacked_9: I tremble in my boots at the sight of you... not.
entries.attacked_8: I shall be merciful. I make short work of my enemies.
entries.attacked_7: I do believe that your ancestors await you eargely in the afterlife.
entries.attacked_6: When you die, I shall treasure the memory of the moment as a high point in my life.
entries.attacked_5: I suppose that a quiet death in bed is a quaint idea these days.
entries.attacked_4: I do hope that you had not made plans for your dotage.
entries.attacked_3: Fights are SO inconvenient. Next time, I shall decline the invitation.
entries.attacked_2: You are hardly the most daunting opponent I have faced.
entries.attacked_1: I suggest you flee. Or die. Your choices really are quite limited.
entries.hit_16: A touch, I do confess it.
entries.hit_15: Well, this is an unappealing happenstance.
entries.hit_12: Now is when I retract all I have said against the medical profession, despite their exorbitant fees.
entries.hit_11: I admit, this could end badly...
entries.hit_9: Nicely done. But can you do it again?
entries.hit_8: If that is the best you can do, you need further training.
entries.hit_7: Well done! A palpable hit. But I am still here!
entries.hit_3: It will take more than that paltry hit to bring me down!
entries.gloat_16: And another enemy meets a just reward...
entries.gloat_10: My apologies. Death can be so inconvenient.
entries.gloat_9: I suggest that the next time, you come better prepared.
entries.gloat_7: I suppose someone shall have to clean up this little... disturbance.
entries.gloat_6: And so you learn the reward of challenging me!
entries.gloat_4: So much for that little distraction.
entries.gloat_3: I admit, the battle was closer than I like.
entries.death_14: You'll live to regret snuffing out such a life as mine...!
entries.death_13: I always imagined I would have more time in this world...
entries.death_12: I am done for, I believe.
entries.death_9: You shall never be rid of me... I shall linger in your memory forever.
entries.death_8: If there be any power in me to haunt you, I shall!
entries.death_5: My life is being cut far too short...
entries.death_2: My vision is darkening... hold me...
entries.death_1: I confess, THAT hurt a great deal.
entries.threat_16: You, my friend, appear to be an excellent candidate for target practice.
entries.threat_15: Many have praised my combat skills, I'll have you know.
entries.threat_14: Really, your corpse shall be quite messy once eviscerated.
entries.threat_13: I pray, give me an excuse to slay you.
entries.threat_12: Come closer, and I may be tempted to take violent action.
entries.threat_10: I have quite a collection of trophies from vanquished enemies...
entries.threat_9: I fear I must insist that you not come any closer.
entries.threat_8: Are you feeling exceptionally lucky today, that you must challenge me?
entries.threat_6: Move away, or I may do something you will regret.
entries.threat_5: The best thing for you to do is to move away quietly.
entries.threat_4: This is a place of great peril for you.
entries.threat_2: I confess, I dislike your sort.
entries.bye_mean_16: I do believe that the air has cleared up, now that we're free of that... smell.
entries.bye_mean_15: I was about to suggest you depart, but you have saved me the trouble.
entries.bye_mean_14: I hope that you don't meet with some untimely demise before we meet again.
entries.bye_mean_13: I pray that you not return.
entries.bye_mean_12: You overstayed your welcome a bit, eh?
entries.bye_mean_11: You overstayed your welcome, so I am glad to see you go.
entries.bye_mean_9: It is a relief to see you gone.
entries.bye_mean_8: Your presence offended me. I am glad it is being removed.
entries.bye_mean_6: If we meet again, it will be to your infinite regret.
entries.bye_mean_5: Remove yourself from here, then. We'll all be the better for it.
entries.bye_mean_4: Farewell, and do not bother returning.
entries.bye_mean_3: Your sort is simply not welcome, I fear. Goodbye!
entries.bye_mean_2: Good riddance to bad rubbish, I always say.
entries.bye_mean_1: I hope not to see your face again.
entries.bye_mid_16: Yes, yes, of course. I have things to do as well. Goodbye.
entries.bye_mid_15: Ah, you must depart? Well, we can chat on some other occasion.
entries.bye_mid_14: No doubt others have placed demands on your time. I will take my leave, then.
entries.bye_mid_13: Have you a prior engagement? Very well, depart then.
entries.bye_mid_12: I see you are expected elsewhere. Farewell.
entries.bye_mid_11: I see you have somewhere to be...?
entries.bye_mid_10: I suppose I wish you farewell. Wherever it is you're going.
entries.bye_mid_8: I shall see you again, I imagine.
entries.bye_mid_5: I see you have to go...?
entries.bye_mid_4: No doubt we shall meet again.
entries.bye_mid_3: I will see you around, no doubt.
entries.bye_nice_16: Must you depart so soon? Oh dear... Be well, my friend.
entries.bye_nice_15: My heart will feel your absence quite keenly, my friend.
entries.bye_nice_14: Your presence gladdened my heart, my friend. I shall endeavor to withstand your absence.
entries.bye_nice_13: It is always a pleasure. Return as soon as you may.
entries.bye_nice_12: Ah, you must go? Very well. I look forward to our next encounter.
entries.bye_nice_11: I regret that you must depart, my friend.
entries.bye_nice_10: I invite and encourage you to drop by again.
entries.bye_nice_9: I look forward to our next meeting.
entries.bye_nice_8: It was an honor and pleasure.
entries.bye_nice_7: It was a pleasure to interact with you.
entries.bye_nice_4: Until we meet again, my friend.
entries.hi_mean_16: You are not welcome in my company nor deserving of it. Kindly depart.
entries.hi_mean_15: Kindly remove yourself from my presence.
entries.hi_mean_14: I see we have an unwelcome visitor.
entries.hi_mean_13: I see a scoundrel has come by to say hello.
entries.hi_mean_10: Do not make me angry, fool. I will not tolerate your presence.
entries.hi_mean_9: Such a burden you are. What are your petty needs this time?
entries.hi_mean_8: You demean me with your presence, mongrel.
entries.hi_mean_7: Skulking around like the low sort you are, eh?
entries.hi_mean_5: Oh dear, my day is quite spoilt. What do you want?
entries.hi_mean_4: My greetings are wasted on the likes of you, but... what do you want?
entries.hi_mean_3: I could swear that a malodorous pest is sniffing about. Ah, I see. One IS.
entries.hi_mean_2: Well, well. Observe who has come to visit.
entries.hi_mean_1: What, pray tell, do YOU want?
entries.hi_mid_15: Ah, yes. May I help you?
entries.hi_mid_10: May I ask what you want?
entries.hi_mid_9: Are you in search of someone?
entries.hi_mid_8: Are you in search of something?
entries.hi_nice_16: Greetings! May I be of assistance?
entries.hi_nice_15: Ah, look who graces us with their presence.
entries.hi_nice_14: A pleasure indeed to see you before me.
entries.hi_nice_11: Welcome. It is a pleasure to see you here.
entries.hi_nice_10: My friend, please, be welcome here. Wonderful to see you.
entries.hi_nice_8: Indeed, you are a sight for sore eyes, my friend.
entries.hi_nice_7: It is, as they say, quite nice to see you, my friend.
entries.hi_nice_5: Good to see you, my friend.
entries.hi_nice_4: It is a pleasure and honor to greet you.
entries.hi_nice_3: I'm honored to see you here.
entries.hi_nice_2: Again, it is wonderful to see you.
entries.hi_nice_1: It is good to see you.
entries.flee_16: I do not deserve to be in this predicament!
entries.flee_14: It appears to be time to beat a hasty retreat.
entries.flee_12: I must depart. In haste. And with a modicum of fear.
entries.flee_10: I beg of anyone, assist me!
entries.flee_6: Let us remove ourselves from here!
entries.calm_16: It appears the danger has passed.
entries.calm_14: So much for that petty concern!
entries.calm_13: So much for that needless worry.
entries.calm_11: Well, that, as they say, is that!
entries.calm_7: As I suspected, there is no cause for alarm.
entries.calm_6: It is apparent there is no immediate danger.
entries.alert_8: Hold on a moment... what was that?
entries.alert_7: I have a disquieting feeling about this...
entries.alert_6: I feel uneasy, of a sudden.
entries.calm_5: Ah, let me cast my thoughts back to my pleasant childhood...
entries.calm_4: Ah, I can take a bit of breather now.
entries.calm_2: Time to calm myself, All is well.
entries.alert_5: Something, I suspect, has gone awry.
entries.alert_4: Do you detect a hint of something malodorous on the air?
entries.alert_3: Hark! Did you hear that sound?
